properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 2:02PM PST until February 5 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, seas 8 to 10 feet
at 11 seconds. For the second Small Craft Advisory, northwest
winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 1 PM to 9 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM PST WEDNESDAY
